Dialogue.text: You three ain't that bad after all. You pay attention! you are able to recognise us as individuals, not many creatures can do that!
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: Tell you what, we like you three. We'll hit you up!
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: We believe that this is yours!
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: The egg! Can we ask where you got it from?
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: We found them in this big boat!
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: Yes, a big boat. On the other side of the reef where it drops down into the deeper ocean.
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: That must be Goliath! We're definitely on the right track!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Hold up. You're not going there are  you? It's dangerous!
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: We have to, we need to retrieve the rest of the eggs.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: You don't want to know... just stay away from the edge of the cliff or you'll be sorry!
Dialogue.Speaker: Infinite Crab Brothers

Dialogue.text: We'll keep that in mind. Thank you
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally
